005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.IDataTypeAdapter;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.IPrintable;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.function.IMapItem;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.function.IMapKey;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
013
014import java.util.Set;
015
016import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
017
018public interface IAnyAtomicItem extends IAtomicValuedItem, IPrintable {
019  @NonNull
020  Set<Class<? extends IAnyAtomicItem>> PRIMITIVE_ITEM_TYPES = ObjectUtils.notNull(Set.of(
021      IStringItem.class,
022      IBooleanItem.class,
023      IDecimalItem.class,
024      IDurationItem.class,
025      IDateTimeItem.class,
026      IDateItem.class,
027      IBase64BinaryItem.class,
028      IAnyUriItem.class));
029
030  @Override
031  @NonNull
032  default IAnyAtomicItem toAtomicItem() {
033    return this;
034  }
035
036  /**
037   * Get the "wrapped" value represented by this item.
038   *
039   * @return the value
040   */
041  @Override
042  @NonNull
043  Object getValue();
044
045  @Override
046  @NonNull
047  String toString();
048
049  /**
050   * Get the item's string value.
051   *
052   * @return the string value value of the item
053   */
054  @Override
055  @NonNull
056  String asString();
057
058  /**
059   * Get the atomic item value as a map key for use with an {@link IMapItem}.
060   *
061   * @return the map key
062   */
063  @NonNull
064  IMapKey asMapKey();
065
066  /**
067   * Get a new {@link IStringItem} based on the the textual value of the item's
068   * "wrapped" value.
069   *
070   * @return a new string item
071   */
072  @NonNull
073  default IStringItem asStringItem() {
074    return IStringItem.valueOf(asString());
075  }
076
077  /**
078   * Get the item's type adapter.
079   *
080   * @return the type adapter for the item
081   */
082  @NonNull
083  IDataTypeAdapter<?> getJavaTypeAdapter();
084  //
085  // <T extends IValuedItem> T cast(IValuedItem item);
086
087  /**
088   * Cast the provided {@code item} to be the same type as this item.
089   *
090   * @param item
091   *          the item to cast
092   * @return the result from casting
093   */
094  @NonNull
095  IAnyAtomicItem castAsType(@NonNull IAnyAtomicItem item);
096
097  /**
098   * Compares this value with the argument. Ordering is item type dependent.
099   *
100   * @param other
101   *          the item to compare with this value
102   * @return a negative integer, zero, or a positive integer if this value is less
103   *         than, equal to, or greater than the {@code item}.
104   */
105  int compareTo(@NonNull IAnyAtomicItem other);
106}
